raw_body: FERNANDO,​ GODWIN : Husband of late Pearl Fernando,​ father of Prasantha Fernando and Sharmila Perera,​ brother of late Fr. Mervyn Fernando,​ father-in-law of Sneha Fernando & Rohan Perera,​ grandfather of Kushan,​ Trishya,​ Amresh,​ Tashya & Aadesh,​ great-grandfather of Kristo and Konstantine. Viewing of remains at A.F. Raymond Funeral Parlour,​ Borella on Saturday,​ 13th January from 11 a.m. to 5 p.m. Burial at Ss. Peter and Paul Catholic Church,​ Lunawa,​ Moratuwa on Sunday,​ 14th January at 3.30 p.m.003003
